lead_paragraph: Tom Morello has always written protest music. It is his aesthetic, his raison d'etre, his trademark. His politics are famously far left and incendiary. In the 1990s, he was the guitarist and one of the ideological forces behind Rage Against the Machine, the hard rock band that did social commentary during a period in American history when few were protesting.

headline.main: Q. and A.: Tom Morello Offers 'a Record of Rousing Hopelessness'
